workshop.title: ADWC Journey: Hands-on Workshop
workshop.description: This workshop will show you how to use Oracle Autonomous Data Warehouse Cloud in the Oracle Public Cloud.

labs.title: Lab 100: Provisioning and Connecting
labs.description: Instructions to provision an ADWC service and connect to ADWC

labs.title: Lab 200: Working with Database Services and Sample Data Sets
labs.description: Understanding the different levels of database services and the sample Star Schema Benchmark (SSB) and Sales History (SH) datasets provided with ADWC

labs.title: Lab 300: Data Loading
labs.description: Instructions to load data from Object Stores using SQL Developer and/or PL/SQL

labs.title: Lab 400: Scaling and Performance in ADWC
labs.description: Understanding how to scale ADWC and its impact on performance and concurrency

labs.title: Lab 500: Oracle Machine Learning Notebooks
labs.description: Instructions to use Oracle Machine Learning Notebooks in ADWC

labs.title: Lab 600: Basic Machine Learning (DBMS_PREDICTIVE_ANALYTICS)
labs.description: Learn to use DBMS_PREDICTIVE_ANALYTICS using a sample Oracle ML Notebook

labs.title: Lab 700: Create Data Visualizations from ADWC
labs.description: Learn to use Data Visualization Desktop with ADWC

labs.title: Lab 700: Create Data Visualizations from OAAC
labs.description: Learn to use Data Visualization in OAAC

labs.title: Lab 800: Data Integration Platform Cloud with ADWC
labs.description: Learn to use Oracle Data Integration Platform Cloud (DIPC) with ADWC
